nodes.documentation:
The Ownable contract has an owner address, and provides basic authorization control
functions to implement permissions
nodes.name: Ownable

nodes.documentation: Event to indicate the transfer of Ownership
nodes.name: OwnershipTransferred

nodes.documentation:
Constructor sets the original `owner` of the contract to the sender
account.
Restricts the operation to the owner.
nodes.name: onlyOwner

nodes.documentation:
Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.
   newOwner Is the address to transfer ownership to.
nodes.name: transferOwnership

nodes.documentation: *   Pausable contract which allows children to implement an emergency pause mechanism.
nodes.name: Pausable

nodes.documentation: Modifier allows a function to be callable only when the contract is not paused.
nodes.name: whenNotPaused

nodes.documentation: Modifier to make a function callable only when the contract is paused.
nodes.name: whenPaused

nodes.documentation: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state
nodes.name: pause

nodes.documentation: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state
nodes.name: unpause

nodes.documentation: Contract that can be closed by the owner. All funds in contract will be sent to the owner.
nodes.name: mortal

nodes.documentation: Transfers the current balance to the owner and kills the contract.
nodes.name: close

nodes.documentation: Account deploying the contract is made the admin and can add other accounts as admin

Adds an administrator. Admins can add more administrators.
@param admin Address to add as administrator
nodes.name: addAdmin

nodes.documentation:
Remove an administrator. Only owners can remove administrators.
     admin Address to remove as administrator
nodes.name: removeAdmin

nodes.documentation:
Checks if address is an administrator.
     admin Address to remove as administrator
     return True if address is admin. False otherwise.
nodes.name: checkAdmin

nodes.documentation:
Returns the length of the requestedStoreOwners array.
     Because there is no way to clear the array as of now,
     the length will include requesters who have already been approved.
	* @return Length of the requestedStoreOwners
nodes.name: getRequestedStoreOwnersLength

nodes.documentation:
Returns the address at position index in requestedStoreOwners
     index Position in requestedStoreOwners
     return Address at position index in requestedStoreOwners
nodes.name: getRequestedStoreOwner

nodes.documentation:
Marks an address as a storeowner
@param requester The address to add as a storeowner
nodes.name: approveStoreOwnerStatus

nodes.documentation:
Removes an address its storeowner status
     storeOwner The address to remove as a storeowner
nodes.name: removeStoreOwnerStatus

nodes.documentation:
Checks if an address has storeowner status
 storeOwner for which to check the status
 return True if the address is a storeowner. False otherwise.
nodes.name: checkStoreOwnerStatus

pause().notice: called by the owner to pause, triggers stopped state

transferOwnership(address).notice: Allows the current owner to transfer control of the contract to a newOwner.   newOwner Is the address to transfer ownership to.

unpause().notice: called by the owner to unpause, returns to normal state

userdoc.notice: *   Pausable contract which allows children to implement an emergency pause mechanism.
